txt.en: DNT This is the second spot
The noxious vapours of the Orc defilers' work waft out from the ruined structures
Scouting the Harlond
The Orcs have fully blocked the southern gate. Siege equipment has been constructed here and there along the wall
DNT Recon the Harlond
Complete Quest, The Harlond: Black Hearts

'Hm... yes. Such a great force of Orcs down there. Even you, [placeholder] that you are, could not stand against them all. And yet, their guard is down. You could harry them from the shadows and cripple them greatly before they even knew you were there.\n\n'Would you brave this deed, [placeholder], for the safety of Lossarnach? I cannot tell you from up here how best it should be done. You should survey the foe with your own eyes, and do what you can.'
DNT This is the fifth spot
Complete Quest, The Harlond: Fell Tools
Complete Quest, The Harlond: Cruel Eyes
'Truly, [placeholder], keen eyes up high are no replacement for a good head on the ground! Your help against the Orcs has earned our eternal gratitude.'

Dindal the scout can be found high up in a secluded look-out, which can be reached by turning north off the east road from Imloth Melui.\n\nYou should return to Dindal and let him know all that you have seen.
DNT Recon the Harlond and the Orc forces
DNT
A large Orc force occupies the Harlond and the Rammas Echor's southern gate.
Speak with Dindal
Investigate the entrance
Investigate the piers
Inspect the northern structure
Investigate the Rammas Echor wall
DNT Recon the Harlond and the Orc forces
DNT Recon the Harlond and the Orc forces

The Orc forces are camped in the Harlond, on the northern edge of Lossarnach and south of the Rammas Echor.\n\nDindal the scout has encouraged you to go into the Harlond and survey the Orc forces to learn what can be done.
Look-outs stand at key locations near the Harlond's entrance
DNT This is the first spot
The Harlond's piers are lightly guarded; they clearly expect no trouble from this direction
